message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you 40% of the total amount. If you accept, we can finalize the deal.
I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering I'm the one taking the risk of rejecting your initial offer. Let's get this done!
Considering the decreased value of the money, I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share. Let's see if you'll accept this offer.
